titles.title: To designate the Federal building and United States courthouse located at 85 Marconi Boulevard in Columbus, Ohio, as the "Joseph P. Kinneary United States Courthouse".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Public Buildings and Economic Development.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

bill.summary: 6/11/1998--Introduced. Designates the Federal building and U.S. courthouse located at 85 Marconi Boulevard in Columbus, Ohio, as the Joseph P. Kinneary United States Courthouse.
